name: Tempeh Chickpea Fritter Patty Burger. Vegan
description: These Tempeh fritters are made with chickpea flour are Indian spiced batter. Serve as is or as a slider
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon garam masala or spice blend of choice
3 Tablespoon of chickpea flour (garbanzo bean flour/besan)
1/2 teaspoon chili flakes or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add all the ingredients under for steaming tempeh strips. Mix well and add tempeh strips.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add all the ingredients under for steaming tempeh strips. Mix well and add tempeh strips.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low heat covered until Tempeh doubles in size and dry. (15 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low heat covered until Tempeh doubles in size and dry. (15 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare batter by blending all ingredients together to get a thick batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare batter by blending all ingredients together to get a thick batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip warm tempeh strips in the batter and shallow fry in a tablespoon or 2 of oil on medium heat in non stick pan(else the batter will stick). or deep fry them.
recipeInstructions.name: Dip warm tempeh strips in the batter and shallow fry in a tablespoon or 2 of oil on medium heat in non stick pan(else the batter will stick). or deep fry them.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook 3-5 minutes each side until crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook 3-5 minutes each side until crisp.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as is with ketchup, mayo, cilantro chutney or make a burger with baby greens, tomatoes, apples, grilled bell peppers, cilantro chutney or sriracha!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as is with ketchup, mayo, cilantro chutney or make a burger with baby greens, tomatoes, apples, grilled bell peppers, cilantro chutney or sriracha!

keywords: fried tempeh, tempeh sliders, vegan burger
